BotPenguin vs wotnot
Meet your omnichannel & affordable WotNot alternative– BotPenguin
Get a WotNot alternative that’s affordable, has all-channel support, integrates natively with 60+ platforms, and is highly customizable. Get BotPenguin.
Detailed head-to-head
FREE Forever plan. No Credit Card Required.
What’s the difference between BotPenguin and WotNot?
As a WotNot alternative, BotPenguin gives more features, affordability, and freedom. Talk about ROI.
Pricing
WotNot starts at $588 per annum, BotPenguin is only $50 per annum.
No. of Chatbots
You can create unlimited chatbots in both WotNot and BotPenguin.
Channels
BotPenguin has all channel support. WotNot is not available on Instagram and Telegram.
Voice Support
You’ll get voice support for bots on both platforms.
So, who’s the best?
Clearly, BotPenguin, as a WotNot alternative, gives more features and ROI.
Launch in minutes

So, why you need a WotNot Alternative?
Steep Pricing: WotNot’s pricing does not justify the features and value it provides in return. Clearly, it’s not suitable for startups and e-commerce stores.
Few Conversations: You only get 2000 monthly conversations in their paid plan. And, their add-on costs $10 per 1000 conversations.
Few Integrations: WotNot lacks in number of native integrations it provides. You only get 32. BotPenguin has 60+. That too, no code!
Not an OmniChannel: WotNot is only available for Facebook, web, and WhatsApp. You can’t use on Telegram, Instagram, and Microsoft Teams.
Lack of Customisation: You’re left stranded when it comes to customizing your chatbot to your likes. There are only a few things you can do.
Poor Chatflow Management: WotNot's visual builder is sometimes less suitable for very complex, large-scale chatbot flows due to potential management difficulties.
Try BotPenguin
What’s not there in WotNot, is in BotPenguin.
Customize your chatbots to whatever extent you want. Your chatbot, your style.
Get 60+ native integrations to various platforms, including ChatGPT, Google Sheets, Microsoft Teams, Shopify, etc.
Get 40+ chatflow templates to get started quickly with lead generation, customer support, and
Do your marketing in hands-free mode with broadcasting and drip sequences.
Let your customers book appointments with long email exchanges with Google Calendar Integration.
Get started for free with 2000 monthly conversations and only $50/ year when you upgrade.
Get Started FREE

Frequently Asked Questions
I'm looking for a more affordable WotNot alternative. Does BotPenguin offer better pricing?
Absolutely! BotPenguin understands the importance of cost-effective solutions. Our pricing plans are often considered more budget-friendly compared to WotNot.
I found WotNot's customization options somewhat limited. Is BotPenguin more flexible?
If you're seeking a highly customizable chatbot solution, BotPenguin could be an excellent WotNot alternative.  We offer advanced customization options that allow you to tailor your chatbot's behavior precisely to your needs.
Can I seamlessly migrate my chatbot from WotNot to BotPenguin?
While the migration process might involve some rebuilding, BotPenguin provides complete onboarding assistance to make the transition from a WotNot alternative as smooth as possible.
Does BotPenguin offer the same integrations as WotNot?
BotPenguin provides integration with 60+ platforms. If you have specific integration needs, let's discuss them – we might offer it directly or could potentially build a custom solution as a WotNot alternative.
WotNot's interface was a bit complex. Is BotPenguin easier to use?
BotPenguin takes pride in its user-friendly interface. We believe chatbot building should be easy and fun. If you value simplicity, BotPenguin could be a great WotNot alternative.
For more FAQs and Guides
